head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MARTIN, RAYMOND K.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MARTIN, RAYMOND K.

block.p: MARTIN-Raymond K., Sr. Of Briarcliff Manor, New York. On July 29, 2000, after a long illness. Beloved husband of Margery. Father of Raymond K. Martin, Jr. & Thomas O. Martin. Grandfather of Raymond K. Martin III, Philip T. Martin and Raymonda P. Martin. Member of Dutch Treat Club, Photographic Administrators, Inc., N.Y. Press Photographers Association. Services will be held at the Briarcliff Congregational Church, 30 South State Rd, Briarcliff Manor, N.Y., Wednesday, Aug. 2, 2 PM.
